channel.title: Comments on: The Moyo people
channel.description: A detailed history of the Shona people of Zimbabwe

item.title: By: Tinotenda Gwenzi
item.dc:creator: Tinotenda Gwenzi
item.description: May I know the lineage of Jiri who is mentioned as one of the sons and heirs to Chirasamhuru

item.title: By: daniel

item.description: so chiduku came from munhumutapa by inheritance

item.title: By: Zisadza Ruth K
item.dc:creator: Zisadza Ruth K
item.description: i just want to know if Chirisamhuru had a son called Mabhanga if so you can assist me with more information concerning Mabhanga.
item.content:encoded: i just want to know if Chirisamhuru had a son called Mabhanga if so you can assist me with more information concerning Mabhanga.
